fields.name: displayExcavation

fields.name: Note
fields.fieldText: Note: If a PTW extension is required, the work site must be revisited to ensure the site conditions have not changed as additional control measures / precautions may be necessary. A new PTW must be issued following six extensions.

fields.name: Authorise
fields.fieldText: Authorisation for work to proceed (to be completed by authorising manager): I confirm that I have checked that the necessary controls and precautions required are in place for the works as outlined above and in the method statement and therefore authorise the works to proceed.

fields.name: Name
fields.fieldText: Name

fields.name: Date
fields.fieldText: Date

fields.name: Permit_recipient
fields.fieldText: Permit recipient (to be completed by the competent person directly responsible for the work): I fully understand the term and conditions of this Permit and will comply with the necessary controls and the precautions outlined a work and in the method statement

fields.name: Name1
fields.fieldText: Name

fields.name: Date1
fields.fieldText: Date

fields.name: Cancelations
fields.fieldText: Cancelations (to be completed by authorising manager): I hereby declare that the work detailed above has been safely completed and all the persons and materials have been cleared and the surrounding areas have been left in a safe and tidy condition

fields.fieldText: Name

fields.name: Date2
fields.fieldText: Date

fields.name: Completed
fields.fieldText: Completed Permits must be kept for a minimum of three years

fields.name: StandardMessage
fields.fieldText: Please go to Quick Actions menu and generate a Service Report for this form immediately, thank you.

fields.name: FinalScreenDisplayText
fields.fieldText: This is the final screen, clicking 'Next' will exit the form.

fields.name: DisplayText
fields.fieldText: UNDERGROUND SERVICES - Genny to be used with CAT at all times. Horizontal digging techniques to be used. All services exposed prior to use of power tools. Henny & CAT to be tested on a known live service before every shift.

fields.name: displaytextonly
fields.fieldText:
Ensure all elements of the construction phase plan are in place e.g. job pack (inc. start/finish times), welfare facilities, access to SOPs & SSOW and this form. If within 10m from an overhead line escalate to your line manager as controls/method statement will be required.

(If the answer is No you must complete the comments and escalate to your manager)

fields.fieldText: Is the traffic management set up suitable for task & does it meet permit conditions?
